name: RAZUR
tagline: Everyone has ideas. We bring them to life.
description:
FROM VENTURE-BACKED STARTUPS TO FORTUNE 100s - WE BRING IDEAS TO LIFE WITH DATA DRIVEN DESIGN AND INTELLIGENCE. 
RAZUR takes a holistic approach to creating digital products: merging digital, social, mobile and offline interactions into a seamless experience. RAZUR creates with the product’s end-user always in mind, which results in increased sales, loyalty and brand affinity. RAZUR’s experience includes working with and advising startups to managing cross-global development teams for Fortune 100 brands.
RAZUR has a proven track record of architecting, designing and developing complex applications and associated business strategies for enterprise customers such as AT&T, UNICEF, Dell SecureWorks, IHG Hotels, Coca-Cola and many others.
